Control Name: COST 7.3 Select third party agreements with cost eﬃcient terms
Control Statement: Cost eﬃcient agreements and terms ensure the cost of these services scales with the beneﬁts they provide. Select agreements and pricing that scale when they provide additional beneﬁts to your organization.

control_attributes.Control: COST 7.3 Select third party agreements with cost eﬃcient terms
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you use pricing models to reduce cost?
